info.official_title: An Exploratory Phase I/II Single-center Clinical Trial of the Efficacy, Tolerability and Safety of Intravenous D-isoascorbic Acid With Arsenic Trioxide in Patients With Advanced/Metastatic Colorectal Cancer Who Have Exhausted Standard Therapy
info.inclusion_criteria:
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 75 Years

identified_line.line: Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 75 Years
Phase 1:
* informed consent to participate in the study

criterions.exact_snippets: informed consent to participate in the study

and_criteria.exact_snippets: informed consent to participate in the study

identified_line.line: * patients of the second clinical group with malignant neoplasms of a common/metastatic form that have exhausted standard therapy.

criterions.exact_snippets: patients of the second clinical group

and_criteria.exact_snippets: patients of the second clinical group

identified_line.line: * patients who have received at least 3 lines of standard therapy, including those with the use of targeted drugs, patients who have exhausted the possibilities of using specialized drugs, as part of the recommendations of treatment protocols

including those with the use of targeted drugs
patients who have exhausted the possibilities of using specialized drugs

patients who have exhausted the possibilities of using specialized drugs

identified_line.line: * the presence of "+" KRAS / NRAS status of the primary tumor or metastatic focus (determined in LEKzone 2, codons 12, 13, 61)
* renal failure, urolithiasis
* diabetes
* thrombophlebitis, tendency to thrombosis
* severe lung disease, dyspnea at rest, pleural effusion
* cardiovascular insufficiency, ejection fraction of the heart <40%
* sensory neuropathy of the 1st degree of any etiology

sensory neuropathy of the 1st degree of any etiology

identified_line.line: * uncontrolled infections
* persons from the category of "vulnerable patients" (homeless, military personnel, incapacitated, patients in emergency conditions, other persons who may be subjected to pressure);

identified_line.line: * diabetes;
* nephrolithiasis or nephrolithiasis;
* the patient does not agree to perform the procedures required by the protocol and is unable to adhere to the schedule of procedures.

identified_line.line: * age up to 18 years
* patients with an autoimmune disease or with a medical diagnosis requiring systemic immunosuppression
* decompensated diabetes mellitus
* renal failure, urolithiasis
* thrombophlebitis, tendency to thrombosis
* severe lung disease, dyspnea at rest, pleural effusion
* cardiovascular insufficiency, ejection fraction of the heart <40%
* sensory neuropathy of the 1st degree of any etiology
* uncontrolled infections
* persons from the category of "vulnerable patients" (homeless, military personnel, incapacitated, patients in emergency conditions, other persons who may be subjected to pressure);
